meta.title: From RED to VIOLET
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: I’m turning 49 this week. 49 is 7x7, so I’m celebrating with seven sets of seven: seven Raddles that go from the first to the seventh. A rainbow contains seven main colors, red through violet, often memorized with the term Roy G. Biv. It was Isaac Newton who pushed for the inclusion of indigo, a tertiary color, in the rainbow canon, though his definition of indigo differs from our current perception: his indigo is our blue, and his blue was our cyan.
